full_output.summary: To leverage my internship experience in human resources and my strong communication and organizational skills to contribute effectively as an HR professional. Seeking a challenging role where I can apply my knowledge in recruitment, employee engagement, and HR operations to support the growth and success of the organization while continuing to develop my expertise in the field

certifications.title: Developing Skills as an HR Professional

education.school: Nagarjuna College of Engineering and Technology
SHRI VENKATESHWARA SCIENCE AND MANAGEMENT OF DEGREE

experiences.description: Screening Resumes: Reviewing applications and resumes to identify qualified candidates based on job requirements and criteria. Scheduling Interviews: Coordinating and scheduling interviews between candidates and hiring managers, ensuring availability and smooth logistics. Conducting Initial Interviews: Performing preliminary phone or video interviews to assess candidates' basic qualifications, experience, and cultural fit. Managing Applicant Tracking System (ATS): Updating and maintaining the ATS with candidate information, interview feedback, and status updates. Supporting Onboarding: Assisting with the preparation and distribution of onboarding materials and coordinating orientation sessions for new hires.

Assisting customers through various procedures related to arrivals and departures. Handling reservations, ticketing, reissuing tickets, and processing refunds. Solve passenger queries and check passenger passports. Cabin grooming and coordination with internal departments and external agencies to ensure smooth cabin operations. Welcoming passengers, providing information, assisting disabled passengers or those traveling with children, checking in luggage, taking reservations, and selling tickets. Excellent interpersonal and customer service skills to consistently meet the airline's goals and vision.

full_output.name: TEJASHWINI V
